about_the_game: In this free DLC, cleverly code named ”Santa’s Little Helper”, the hunt for the Deus Helix gets a christmassy makeover with intergalactic jingle bells, alien winter wonderlands and helpful holiday hints from your I-DBUGS elfs. Your favorite guide Nikodemus puts on his best holiday behavior (in the aftermath of the annual I-DBUGS Xmas party), and you might even spot Santa himself among the old Susurri worlds. Experience the epic helix hunt in the most festive of ways. Come celebrate the winter, or come back in the summer for all your Christmas needs.
detailed_description: In this free DLC, cleverly code named ”Santa’s Little Helper”, the hunt for the Deus Helix gets a christmassy makeover with intergalactic jingle bells, alien winter wonderlands and helpful holiday hints from your I-DBUGS elfs. Your favorite guide Nikodemus puts on his best holiday behavior (in the aftermath of the annual I-DBUGS Xmas party), and you might even spot Santa himself among the old Susurri worlds. Experience the epic helix hunt in the most festive of ways. Come celebrate the winter, or come back in the summer for all your Christmas needs.

name: SVRVIVE: The Deus Helix - Christmas DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i7-4790 or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce® GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommend installing to SSD for faster performance
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience Christmas in the cosmos! Complete with intergalactic jingle bells, alien winter wonderlands and helpful holiday hints from your I-DBUGS elfs!
